derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English kerchef, from Old French cuevrechief, from couvrir 'to cover' + chief 'head'

entry.def: A kerchief is a piece of cloth that you can wear on your head or round your neck.

means.word_mean: 1. a square scarf that is folded into a triangle and worn over the head or about the neck
